caption.p: Schematic representation of the design and action mechanism of S1-Teb under usual vaginal conditions (A) and in the presence of C. albicans (B) ( S. cerevisiae has been used in experimental assays as a model organism). Abbreviation: MCM-41, mobil composition of matter-41; S1-Teb, MCM-41 loaded with tebuconazole [ 142].
